about_the_game:
At your favorite job, you were replaced by a zombie, and you were left without a livelihood? In the fantasy world, this is not a problem, for any unemployed person there will be a magical artifact that can turn life into a fairy tale. You have this artifact a magic sword that can defeat any enemy, with its help you have to perform many feats, visit magical places and earn money. On your way, you will meet strong opponents, dangerous traps, hidden treasures and unusual friends.

Key features:
  • Beautiful pixel graphics and smooth animations
  • Exciting and intense battles
  • Epic boss fights
  • Well-developed linear plot
  • Detailed and interesting game world
  • Various characters and funny dialogues
  • Amazing abilities that allow you to climb into any part of the world

short_description: The Slacker Dungeon is a is a 2D side-scrolling metroidvania action game. You have to play as a guy who found an enchanted intelligent sword and went on an adventure in search of wealth and an easy life.
